1.details: Implement batched inventory refresh with queue system, retry logic with exponential backoff, rate limit handling, and progress tracking to handle 50+ product refreshes without errors

2.details: Build complete image ingest pipeline with R2 Worker integration, status tracking, retry mechanisms, and background processing to ensure all imported products get their images within 2-5 minutes

3.details: Add comprehensive toast notifications, progress bars for inventory refresh and image processing, and audit logging with timestamps for all operations

4.details: Implement chunked background processing, resumable jobs, and pagination to handle full vendor catalog imports efficiently without UI blocking

5.details: Test inventory refresh on 50+ items, verify images appear within 2-5 minutes, and validate bulk import of 100+ products with proper deduplication and error handling
